subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=8|rs=日06}} <!-- Not listed as a shinjitai form of 晉 in Jinmeiyō kanji (2015) or Jōyō Kanji (2010). -->

# to [[proceed]]
# {{lb|ja|of China}} [[Jin]]

subSections.title: Readings
Proper noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
Usage notes
subSections.text: This reading is used to distinguish from the {{m|ja|漢音|tr=kan'on}} reading of {{m|ja|秦|tr=Shin||{{w|Qin dynasty}}}}, itself called {{m|ja|秦|tr=Hata-shin}}. The senses are the same for Etymology 1 above.

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|すすみ|yomi=k}}

Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{m|ja|進む|tr=susumu||to [[proceed]]}}.
